title: LA-17-04: Identifying a “Sponsor” under the Gift Rules for Purposes of the Free Attendance Exclusion and the Widely Attended Gatherings Exception
summary: This Legal Advisory assists agencies in identifying a “sponsor” of an event for purposes of the Free Attendance Exclusion and the Widely Attended Gatherings (WAG) Exception to the gift rules in the Standards of Ethical Conduct at 5 C.F.R. § 2635.203(b)(8) and 5 C.F.R. § 2635.204(g).
